original_text: They shall also strip thee out of thy clothes, and take away thy fair jewels.
korean_text: 또 네 옷을 벗기며 네 장식품을 빼앗을지라

sentences.original_text: They shall also strip thee out of thy clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 너에게서 옷을 벗길 것이다

sentences.original_text: and take away thy fair jewels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 아름다운 보석들을 가져갈 것이다
